name: ultimate-jekyll
description: A template that helps you jumpstart your Jekyll sites and is fueled by an intuitive incorporation of npm, gulp, and is fully SEO optimized and blazingly fast.

scripts.start: npx uj clean && npx uj setup && bundle exec npm run gulp --
scripts.build: npx uj clean && npx uj setup && UJ_BUILD_MODE=true bundle exec npm run gulp -- build
